rules_text: When Repurposed Custodian enters, shuffle any number of target cards from graveyards into their owner's libraries.
flavor_text:
[i]“No idea what the Precursors made it for, but we use it to ensure that your ashes are properly scattered on the wind.”
—Brandy Axel[/i]
notes: The Legend of Chavo Guerrero — The Mountain Goats
